mapper.insert: insert into orders (number,status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, pay_method,pay_status, amount, consignee, phone, address, remark,estimated_delivery_time, delivery_status,pack_amount,tableware_number,tableware_status) values (#{number},#{status},#{userId},#{addressBookId},#{orderTime},#{checkoutTime}, #{payMethod},#{payStatus},#{amount},#{consignee},#{phone},#{address},#{remark},#{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{deliveryStatus},#{packAmount},#{tablewareNumber},#{tablewareStatus})
